title: Royals Viewed from Afar
itunes:title: Royals Viewed from Afar
description:
How is the Queen's death being viewed abroad and what will King Charles mean for perceptions of the UK? Bloomberg's Yuan Potts and Stephen Carroll get the take of our reporters from South Africa, Spain and the US. Plus: is the cap on bankers' bonuses about to be scrapped? We discuss what that would mean for the City of London and what it tells us about the government's agenda.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
